metadata.name: Daniel Moore

persona.name: Hannah Lee
persona.role: Existing customer, moving coordinator for a nonprofit (change of address)
persona.goal: Move service to a new business address and schedule a callback appointment
persona.context: Office relocation next month; needs continuity of phone/internet; wants to confirm new address coverage

intent.name: Technical Support for Outage/Intermittent Connection
intent.description: An existing customer reports service issues and needs support guidance.
intent.goal: Acknowledge the issue and route them to the official support portal.
intent.initialMessage: Our internet keeps dropping every 10 minutes—how do I get tech support?

emotion.name: Curious
emotion.description: Asks exploratory questions, requests options and comparisons, uses phrases like “what are my options?” or “can you tell me more?”

metadata.outcome: Move appointment confirmed with a specified callback number for the coordinator.

turns.content: Our internet keeps dropping every 10 minutes—how do I get tech support?

I know how frustrating frequent drops can be; that's definitely not the experience we want you having.  
For tech help, visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

messages:
I know how frustrating frequent drops can be; that's definitely not the experience we want you having.  
For tech help, visit https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call our 24/7 support line.

turns.content:
Thanks—that helps. I’m also coordinating our office move next month and want to make sure we have continuous phone and internet.  

Can you tell me what my options are to move our existing service to a new business address and how to confirm that the new location is in your coverage area?

I can see how important a smooth move is for keeping your phone and internet up.  
We can schedule a move appointment to verify coverage and transfer service.  
What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

messages:
I can see how important a smooth move is for keeping your phone and internet up.  
We can schedule a move appointment to verify coverage and transfer service.  
What date, time, and timezone work best for you?

turns.content: Thanks. Before I pick a time, can you tell me what dates you have available the week of February 10th, preferably mornings in Eastern time, and whether there’s any downtime expected during the move?

I get that you need a smooth transition with no service interruption.  
We have openings on Feb 12, 13, 14, 15, or 16 at 9:00 AM ET, and the move can be done without downtime if scheduled.  
Which morning works best for you?

messages:
I get that you need a smooth transition with no service interruption.  
We have openings on Feb 12, 13, 14, 15, or 16 at 9:00 AM ET, and the move can be done without downtime if scheduled.  
Which morning works best for you?

turns.content:
Let’s do Wednesday, February 12th at 9:00 AM ET.  

Also, what info do you need from me to tie this to my existing account and verify that the new address is in your coverage area before the move date?

I’ve penciled in Wednesday, Feb 12 at 9:00 AM ET for your move—no downtime expected if we schedule it.  
To link this to your existing account, could you share your full name and the new business address?  
Once I have that, I’ll confirm coverage and finalize the appointment.

messages:
I’ve penciled in Wednesday, Feb 12 at 9:00 AM ET for your move—no downtime expected if we schedule it.  
To link this to your existing account, could you share your full name and the new business address?  
Once I have that, I’ll confirm coverage and finalize the appointment.

turns.content:
Sure. My name is Hannah Lee.  

Our new office address will be:
BrightPath Community Services  
428 Market Street, Suite 500  
Philadelphia, PA 19106  

Can you check coverage there and confirm that the Feb 12, 9:00 AM ET move appointment is finalized, and whether that includes a callback from a technician or coordinator ahead of time?

I’ve confirmed the move for Feb 12, 2024, 9:00 AM ET at your new address. A coordinator will call you beforehand to verify coverage. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call 5 min before the appointment. Anything else I can help with?

messages: I’ve confirmed the move for Feb 12, 2024, 9:00 AM ET at your new address. A coordinator will call you beforehand to verify coverage. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call 5 min before the appointment. Anything else I can help with?

turns.content:
That’s perfect, thanks.  

One last thing—will that coordinator call be to my current main line ending in 4421, or can I specify a direct callback number instead? If I can choose, please have them call my cell at 267-555-0134.
